title: Silva (Dr. Americo Ciriaco Correia da)
body: He was appointed Civil Governor of the District by decree on May 25, 1918, taking office on June 7. He holds a law degree from the University of Coimbra and was born in Funchal on March 16, 1893.

Funchal: Birthplace of Dr. Americo Ciriaco Correia da Silva

1918: Appointment of Dr. Americo Ciriaco Correia da Silva as Civil Governor of the District
1893: Year of birth of Dr. Americo Ciriaco Correia da Silva
